inventory: Berkeley, University of California, Bancroft Library, UC 3010
bibliography: P. Collart, PLL 44 (= Rev. de philol. 3e sér., 15 (1941), p. 117); E.A. Lowe, CLA XI, 1647; R. Marichal, ChLA V, 304 (with transcript, p. 60).
author: anon.
contents: Latin prose text on the labours of Hercules.
statepreservation: remains of 16 lines, broken off to the right and badly damaged at places; at the very top, 1 line from an unidentified text (in a different hand).
hand: large cursive, written with care, most letters with hooks and decorations;"capitals with some cursive forms" (ed. princ.); "semi-onciale" (Collart); "expert calligraphic cursive" (Lowe); "écriture de chancellerie très solennelle" (Marichal).
